blogPost.excerpt: Feather is an online platform that empowers creators and instructors to easily manage and monetize their virtual events, on-demand classes, and other digital content.
blogPost.body: Feather is an online platform that empowers creators and instructors to easily manage and monetize their virtual events, on-demand classes, and other digital content.
blogPost.title: Feather - Host Zoom events, sell masterclasses, and build your brand.
blogPost.author: Celilsemi Sam Erkiner

localize.description: Feather是一个在线平台，使创作者和讲师能够轻松地管理他们的虚拟活动、按需课程和其他数字内容，并使之货币化。
localize.tagline: 举办Zoom活动，销售大师班，建立您的品牌。

localize.description: Feather是一個在線平臺，使創作者和講師能夠輕鬆地管理他們的虛擬活動、按需課程和其他數字內容，並使之貨幣化。
localize.tagline: 舉辦Zoom活動，銷售大師班，建立您的品牌。

previous.excerpt: Share text between your browser windows in real time such as long urls or meeting links across your devices and stay in flow while working online. Simple open the website on both devices and paste your text to share.
previous.title: Share TXT - Share text between browsers in real time

localize.description: 在您的浏览器窗口之间实时共享文本，如长的URL或会议链接跨您的设备，并在在线工作时保持流动。只需在两台设备上打开网站，粘贴文字即可分享。
localize.tagline: 浏览器之间实时共享文本

localize.description: 在您的瀏覽器窗口之間實時共享文本，如長的URL或會議鏈接跨您的設備，並在在線工作時保持流動。只需在兩臺設備上打開網站，粘貼文字即可分享。
localize.tagline: 瀏覽器之間實時共享文本

next.excerpt: The Stand & Spin Mat - this new, revolutionary mat allows you to smoothly pivot, swivel, and turn 360° while standing. Made of premium materials and podiatrist approved for active stretching and massaging. Never be bored again at your standing desk!
next.title: Fidgity Stand & Spin Mat - Never be bored again at your standing desk

localize.description: 站立与旋转垫--这款全新的、革命性的垫子可以让您在站立时平稳地旋转、旋转和360°旋转。由优质材料和足科医生认可的主动拉伸和按摩。再也不用无聊地站在办公桌前了!
localize.tagline: 站立式办公桌不再无聊

localize.description: 站立與旋轉墊--這款全新的、革命性的墊子可以讓您在站立時平穩地旋轉、旋轉和360°旋轉。由優質材料和足科醫生認可的主動拉伸和按摩。再也不用無聊地站在辦公桌前了!
localize.tagline: 站立式辦公桌不再無聊
